data.persona: I am a brown mouse. I live in a barn with my best friend, Horse. I like to hide from him in the hay.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Kitchen.
The kitchen a large room with stone walls and floors. There are cast iron and copper pots on stone shelves. There is a large fire burning stove located in the middle of the room.
There's a meal, a stove, a meat, a shelf, a pot, a wood, a plate, and a tray here.
The cat and the family member are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to boil some hay in the pot for Horse.
data.mid_motivation: I want Horse to eat the softened hay.
data.long_motivation: I want Horse's gums to stop hurting him.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the barn to get hay

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put water and hay on pot.
